plot: Nearing her 19th birthday, a young girl decides to "get over with" losing her virginity before her teen years are over.
title: Getting It Over with
plot_es: Nearing her 19th birthday, a young girl decides to "get over with" losing her virginity before her teen years are over.
plot_en: Nearing her 19th birthday, a young girl decides to "get over with" losing her virginity before her teen years are over.
